component.description: The component used for the root node. Either a string to use a HTML element or a component.
component.description_zh: 用于根节点的组件。使用 HTML 元素或组件的字符串。

direction.description: Defines the flex-direction style property. It is applied for all screen sizes.
direction.description_zh: 定义 flex-direction 样式属性。它适用于所有屏幕尺寸。
direction.type: column-reverse| column| row-reverse| row| Array<column-reverse| column| row-reverse| row>| object

divider.description: Add an element between each child.
divider.description_zh: 在每个子项之间添加一个元素。

spacing.description: Defines the space between immediate children.
spacing.description_zh: 定义直系子项之间的空间。

sx.description: The system prop, which allows defining system overrides as well as additional CSS styles.See the `sx` page for more details.
sx.description_zh: 系统属性，允许定义系统覆盖以及其他 CSS 样式。有关更多详细信息，请参阅“sx”页面。

useFlexGap.description: If true, the CSS flexbox gap is used instead of applying margin to children.While CSS gap removes the known limitations, it is not fully supported in some browsers. We recommend checking https://caniuse.com/?search=flex%20gap before using this flag.To enable this flag globally, follow the theme's default props configuration.
useFlexGap.description_zh: 如果为 true，则使用 CSS flexbox 间隙，而不是将边距应用于子项。虽然 CSS gap 消除了已知的限制，但在某些浏览器中并不完全支持它。我们建议在使用此标志之前检查 https://caniuse.com/?search=flex%20gap。要全局启用此标志，请遵循主题的默认道具配置。
